mapper.sql: select id, name, version_num, source_code, is_fource, feature, url, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, create_id, update_id from t_sysmgr_version_config
mapper.insert: insert into t_sysmgr_version_config (id,name, version_num, source_code, is_fource, feature, url, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, create_id, update_id) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{versionNum}, #{sourceCode}, #{isFource}, #{feature}, #{url}, #{isDeleted}, now(), now(), #{createId}, #{updateId})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(version_num) FROM t_sysmgr_version_config where source_code = #{sourceCode}
where source_code = #{sourceCode} and version_num = #{versionNum} and is_deleted = 'n'

where version_num between #{versionNum}+1 and (select max(version_num) from t_sysmgr_version_config where source_code = #{sourceCode}) and is_fource = 1 and is_deleted = 'n' and source_code = #{sourceCode}
